sub_title: Engineering Doctorate | Chemical Engineer | RUG/TU Delft | Energy Transition | Lifelong Learner and Dreamer
summary: I am a goal-driven chemical engineer with experience in handling multiple academic and industrial projects related to process and product designing. I am passionate about my work and enjoy working in teams. With core skills in reactor engineering, catalysis, and material characterisation, I am currently seeking opportunities in research and development sectors, wherein I can apply my technical experience and creative problem-solving skills.
